channel.title: How do i make players attk npcs and equip a weapon?
channel.description: i try to equip silverlight and this is what i saw on the 508 "run.bat" Unsupported item: 2402 and this is what i saw for npcs when i try to attk a goblin Unhandled npc option 1: 138 help would be nice

item.title: How do i make players attk npcs and equip a weapon?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

its in item.cfg
and yes its a 508
how do i make it recognize?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 27, 2008, 06:54:01 pm[/size][hr]some other notepads?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make players attk npcs and equip a weapon?

item.title: How do i make players attk npcs and equip a weapon?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

1’st off-
Unsupported item = Make it recognized.
And notice the ‘138’ on the NPC option, the case for you attacking the NPC.
This is a 508 correct?

Read full topic
